1.title: Pilot
1.plot: William, a successful artist is accused of murdering Jennifer Stone, a young and beautiful painter. During the interrogation it is discovered that William and Jennifer were having an affair. Inspector Evans uses this discovery as the motive for William to kill Jennifer, so he can go back to his wife. The truth can't be more different. While the interrogation is going on, Evans partner Officer Bradley makes a discovery that could change everything.
